statements: Core Business Group in the FMCG sector has raised concern during internal review. Gross margin fell from 33% to 27% in 2 years. Competitor unit is showing better margins. What should the leadership team do?
STRATEGY.justification: Profitability concerns and margin drops warrant operational re-evaluation rather than expansion or exit.

row: Unit has highest employee attrition in the company

statements: Core Business Group in the FMCG sector has raised concern during internal review. Unit has highest employee attrition in the company. CapEx was doubled last year. What should the leadership team do?
STRATEGY.correct: Divest or Shut Down Business Unit
STRATEGY.justification: Weak performance metrics and misalignment with strategic goals suggest an exit is prudent.
